summary.span: 容器時間表，提供目標設為其子動畫資訊的物件和屬性。

span.span: A container timeline that provides object and property targeting information for its child animations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 以互動方式控制分鏡腳本Interactively Controlling Storyboards 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在標記中，您指定的屬性物件來建立它; 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。To make a storyboard controllable in markup, you specify the property of the object that creates it; for an example, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). ## 資料繫結和動畫時間軸Data Binding and Animating Timelines 大部分的時間軸屬性可以是資料繫結或以動畫顯示;不過，由於計時系統的運作的方式，資料繫結或動畫時間軸行為不像其他資料繫結或動畫物件。Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects. 若要了解其行為，它有助於了解啟用時間軸的意義。To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline. 啟動時間軸時，複本是由時間軸和及其子時刻表。When a timeline is activated, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines. 這些複本會被凍結 （變成唯讀狀態） 和從中建立物件。These copies are frozen (made read-only) and objects are created from them. 這些時鐘會執行以動畫顯示目標屬性的實際工作。These clocks do the actual work of animating the targeted properties. 如果時間表是資料繫結或動畫，快照集及其目前值的項目時建立其時鐘。If a timeline is data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values is made when its clock is created. 即使原始時間軸可能會持續變更，其時鐘則否。Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not. 以反映資料繫結或動畫變更時刻表，其時鐘必須重新建立。For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be re-created. 時鐘會不重新為您自動建立。Clocks are not re-created for you automatically. 以下是幾種可套用時間軸變更的方式︰The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - 如果時間軸是或屬於，您可以將它重新套用其分鏡腳本的使用，以反映變更或方法。If the timeline is or belongs to a , you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a or the method. 這也會一併重新啟動動畫。This has the side effect of also restarting the animation. 在程式碼中，您可以使用方法將分鏡腳本回它先前的位置。In code, you can use the method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position. - 如果您直接將屬性套用動畫方法中，呼叫方法一次，並將它傳遞已修改的動畫。If you applied an animation directly to a property using the method, call the method again and pass it the animation that has been modified. - 如果您正在直接在時鐘層級，建立和套用一組新的時鐘，並使用它們來取代前一組建立的時鐘。If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of created clocks. 如需資料的範例繫結動畫，請參閱 < [ 主要曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。For an example of a data bound animation, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您套用， ，或屬性，使用 、 任何先前該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源，計時系統並不會自動移除這些時鐘。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically. 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量時鐘使用，完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 有幾個方式可移除時鐘。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用或動畫物件的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`作為第二個。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。This removes all animation clocks from the property. - 若要移除特定從時鐘清單，使用屬性擷取，然後呼叫方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 這通常是時鐘的事件處理常式。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制;的子系時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock returns `null`. 也請注意，是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。Note also that the event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時要呼叫。In that case, the user must determine when to call . 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 回收物件時，其時鐘也會中斷連接，並進行記憶體回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected. 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用來以動畫顯示，當使用者 left-clicks，而當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵。The following example uses the to animate when the user left-clicks, and the when the user right-clicks. [!code-csharp[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/CSharp/FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExample.cs#frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementStoryboardWithHandoffBehaviorExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/visualbasic/frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexample.vb#frameworkcontentelementstoryboardwithhandoffbehaviorexamplewholepage)]

the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically. 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量時鐘使用，完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 有幾個方式可移除時鐘。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用或動畫物件的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`作為第二個。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。This removes all animation clocks from the property. - 若要移除特定從時鐘清單，使用屬性擷取，然後呼叫方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 這通常是時鐘的事件處理常式。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制;的子系時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock returns `null`. 也請注意，是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。Note also that the event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時要呼叫。In that case, the user must determine when to call . 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 回收物件時，其時鐘也會中斷連接，並進行記憶體回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected. 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用可控制的分鏡腳本以動畫顯示。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 內含的名稱範圍。The is contained within a 's name scope. remarks.format: ## Remarks 時鐘的速度是在目前行進時間，與實際時間相比較的速率。A clock's speed is the rate at which its time is currently progressing, compared to real-world time. 若要使用此方法來擷取分鏡腳本時鐘的相關資訊，必須可控制分鏡腳本。To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時鐘的第一個反覆項目有值為 1。A clock's first iteration has a value of 1. 如果這個分鏡腳本設定`true`，完整的反覆項目都包含一個轉寄反向組，不只是其中一個區段。If this storyboard has a setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments. 若要使用此方法來擷取分鏡腳本時鐘的相關資訊，必須可控制分鏡腳本。To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時鐘的第一個反覆項目有值為 1。A clock's first iteration has a value of 1. 如果這個時鐘的時間軸設定`true`，完整的反覆項目都包含一個轉寄反向組，不只是其中一個區段。If this clock's timeline has an setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments. 其目前反覆項目，不論搜尋時鐘會傳回其目前的反覆項目為 1。Regardless of its current iteration, seeking a clock returns its current iteration to 1. 重新啟動時鐘也會傳回其目前的反覆項目為 1。Restarting a clock also returns its current iteration to 1. 若要使用此方法來擷取分鏡腳本時鐘的相關資訊，必須可控制分鏡腳本。To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pause() cil managed

summary.span: 暫停為這個 所建立的 。

span.span: Pauses the that was created for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會暫停分鏡腳本，但有任何顯著的影響，如果它不是作用中或目前已暫停。This method pauses the storyboard, but has no discernible effect if it is not active or currently paused. 副作用，也會暫停所有相關聯的子系。As a side effect, all associated children are also paused. 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). ## 從 已暫停的分鏡腳本Beginning a Paused Storyboard 當您已暫停分鏡腳本，它看起來像是繼續並重新啟動。When you a storyboard that was paused, it appears to resume and restart. 不過，這是不實際發生什麼事。However, that is not what actually happens. 方法實際上會取代已暫停以新的未暫停版本。The method actually replaces the paused with a new unpaused version. 每次呼叫方法，當建立分鏡腳本的時鐘物件。Each time the method is called, clock objects are created for the storyboard. 這些時鐘會分散到它們要建立動畫的屬性。These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate. 因此，當方法會呼叫同樣地，它不會重新啟動其時鐘; 會取代新時鐘。So, when the method is called again, it does not restart its clocks; it replaces them with new clocks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會暫停分鏡腳本，但有任何顯著的影響，如果它不是作用中或目前已暫停。This method pauses the storyboard, but has no discernible effect if it is not active or currently paused. 副作用，也會暫停所有相關聯的子系。As a side effect, all associated children are also paused. 搜尋已暫停的分鏡腳本才會繼續它。Seeking a paused storyboard does not resume it. 若要繼續暫停的分鏡腳本的唯一方法是使用方法。The only way to resume a paused storyboard is to use the method. 呼叫方法一次會暫停的分鏡腳本取代為新的連線，已繼續它的外觀。Calling the method again replaces the paused storyboard with a new one, which has the appearance of resuming it. 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須使用相同`containingObject`時呼叫您用來開始分鏡腳本的互動方法的參數。To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard. 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 從範例中，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。Fro an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 暫停分鏡腳本時鐘觸發程序事件。Pausing a storyboard's clock triggers the event. ## 從 已暫停的分鏡腳本Beginning a Paused Storyboard 當您已暫停分鏡腳本，它看起來像是繼續並重新啟動。When you a storyboard that was paused, it appears to resume and restart. 不過，這是不實際發生什麼事。However, that is not what actually happens. 方法實際上會取代本身未暫停的版本。The method actually replaces itself with an unpaused version. 每次呼叫方法，當建立分鏡腳本的時鐘物件。Each time the method is called, clock objects are created for the storyboard. 這些時鐘會分散到它們要建立動畫的屬性。These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate. 因此，當方法會呼叫同樣地，它不會重新啟動其時鐘; 會取代新時鐘。So, when the method is called again, it does not restart its clocks; it replaces them with new clocks. ## Examples 下列範例會使用可控制的分鏡腳本以動畫顯示。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 內含的名稱範圍。The is contained within a 's name scope. [!code-csharp[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExampleUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/CSharp/FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExample.cs#frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexampleusingwholepage)] [!code-vb[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#FrameworkContentElementControlStoryboardExampleUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/visualbasic/frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexample.vb#frameworkcontentelementcontrolstoryboardexampleusingwholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 所執行的所有互動式動作，因此也在，計時引擎下, 一次轉譯前短暫發生這種情況下一個刻度上發生。All interactive actions taken on a , and therefore also on a , occur on the next tick of the timing engine, which happens shortly before the next render. 這表示方法仍會影響的動畫的屬性到這個階段。This means that the method still affects the animated properties until this time. 換句話說下, 一次顯示的畫面格時，將分鏡腳本會移除。In other words, the next time the frame is displayed, the storyboard is removed. 如果您要取消關聯從屬性的動畫，此時間之前，請使用方法`animation`參數值的`null`。If you need to disassociate an animation from a property before this time, use the method with an `animation` parameter value of `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼續未暫停分鏡腳本，沒有任何作用。Resuming a storyboard that is not paused has no effect. 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須使用相同`containingObject`時呼叫您用來開始分鏡腳本的互動方法的參數。To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard. 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 搜尋已暫停的分鏡腳本才會繼續它。Seeking a paused storyboard does not resume it. 若要繼續暫停的分鏡腳本的唯一方法是使用方法。The only way to resume a paused storyboard is to use the method. 呼叫分鏡腳本開始後的方法會取代舊的分鏡腳本可繼續它的外觀。Calling the method after the storyboard has started replaces the old storyboard, which has the appearance of resuming it. 繼續已暫停的分鏡腳本時鐘就會觸發事件。Resuming a paused a storyboard's clock triggers the event. ## Examples 下列範例會使用可控制的分鏡腳本以動畫顯示。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 內含的名稱範圍。The is contained within a 's name scope. remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，搜尋作業不會將分鏡腳本或設定納入考量。Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's or settings into account. 分鏡腳本會被當成其為 1 且沒有。The storyboard is treated as though it has a of 1 and no . 這個方法會變更分鏡腳本時鐘至。This method changes the storyboard clock's to . 這個方法會有不會影響計時樹狀結構處理刻度的下一次。This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed. 副作用，引發適當的事件會也不在那之前。As a side-effect, the appropriate events are also not raised until then. 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須使用相同`containingObject`時呼叫您用來開始分鏡腳本的互動方法的參數。To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard. 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止，而且如果它由控制移除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed if it is made controllable. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). 搜尋分鏡腳本的觸發程序和事件。Seeking a storyboard triggers the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何搜尋分鏡腳本開始後的一秒 （略過）。The following example shows how to seek (skip) to one second after a Storyboard begins. remarks.format: ## Remarks 對齊的 seeked 時間與最後一個的時鐘刻度。 aligns the seeked time of the with the last clock tick. 值會立即更新以反映所做的變更原因，即使螢幕不會反映這些變更，直到畫面更新。Values are immediately updated to reflect the changes due to , even though the screen does not reflect these changes until the screen updates. 請注意，搜尋作業不會將分鏡腳本或設定納入考量。Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's or settings into account. 分鏡腳本會被當成其為 1 且沒有。The storyboard is treated as though it has a of 1 and no . 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將前移分鏡腳本的結尾作用期; 目前的時間分鏡腳本的行為現在由其設定。This method advances the storyboard's current time to the end of its active period; the storyboard's behavior at this point is specified by its setting. 如果設定為，將分鏡腳本填滿; 屬性設定為如果，分鏡腳本停止。If is set to , the storyboard fills; if the property is set to , the storyboard stops. 無限期使用分鏡腳本上呼叫這個方法，不限數目的重複項目沒有任何作用。Calling this method on a storyboard with an infinite duration, an infinite number of repetitions has no effect. 非使用中的分鏡腳本上呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用。Calling this method on an inactive storyboard has no effect. 前進到其填滿週期觸發程序的時鐘和事件。Advancing a clock to its fill period triggers the and events. 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須使用相同`containingObject`時呼叫您用來開始分鏡腳本的互動方法的參數。To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard. 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed. 若要讓分鏡腳本控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載方法並指定`true`進行控制。To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's method and specify `true` to make it controllable. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本開始後](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用可控制的分鏡腳本以動畫顯示。The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a . 內含的名稱範圍。The is contained within a 's name scope. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性是選擇性的。Setting this property is optional. 如果未指定，分鏡腳本動畫套用至下列其中之一：If the is not specified, a storyboard's animations are applied to one of the following: - 如果您使用啟動分鏡腳本動畫所屬，擁有的項目觸發分鏡腳本的動作為目標。If the storyboard to which the animation belongs was started using a , the element that owns the action that triggers the storyboard is targeted. - 如果您使用啟動分鏡腳本方法中，或指定與啟動分鏡腳本時方法為目標。If the storyboard was started using the method, the or specified when the storyboard was started with the method is targeted. 當這個屬性設定在時間軸，包含子系時，這些子時刻表 「 繼承 」 在父系的除非他們另外指定自己。When this property is set on a timeline with children, those child timelines "inherit" the parent's unless they specify their own. ## 讓物件將目標設為Making an Object Targetable 當使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您可以執行的分鏡腳本使物件將目標設為下列兩個動作之一：When using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you perform one of the following two actions to make an object targetable by a storyboard: - 如果物件是或是，將其屬性。If the object is a or a , set its property. - 如果物件是或自訂或是，將它指派名稱，使用[X:name 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)標記延伸。If the object is a or a custom or , assign it a name using the [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) markup extension. 使用程式碼，當您讓物件將目標設為使用方法來將物件指派名稱。When using code, you make an object targetable by using the method to assign the object a name. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
